product_name: Novara Carema Gel Road Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: As you follow the rolling contours of the road, let Novara Carema women's bike shorts support those hard working legs. 4-way stretch fabric and 8-panel construction provide support for hard-working muscles; moisture-wicking, quick-drying finish increases comfort. Yoga-inspired waistband features crossover stretch fabric in front for superior comfort while tucked over the bike. Novara Gel chamois conforms to body contours; a top layer of breathable foam and a bottom layer of thin, resilient foam enhances comfort on the bike. Full-coverage, women-specific Novara Gel chamois features a perforated gel pad to cushion; microfiber cover wicks moisture away. Gel pad system dissipates shock and reduces skin irritation by forming a fluid barrier between the hard saddle shell and the cyclist. Ultrasoft, breathable chamois is fully elasticized for flex and stretch. Flatlock seams eliminate chafing. Silicone elastic leg grippers keep hems from riding up. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: As you follow the rolling contours of the road, let Novara Carema women's bike shorts support those hard working legs.
